title: Group dialog should be displayed even if dataset is not set
description: When trying to open the group dialog, an error occurs and it does not display. According to the template requirements, the UI should not perform validation.
OB: When attempting to open the group dialog, an error message is displayed.
EB: The group dialog should be displayed regardless of whether the dataset is set or not.
SR: To reproduce this issue, try to open the group dialog without setting the dataset.
